Title: Verify Appointment Booking
Description: Verify that a patient can successfully book an appointment with a diagnostic center.
Precondition: The patient must be logged in to the application.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with valid details.
3. Submit the registration form.
Type (P / N / in): P
Test priority: High
Test type: Functional
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with invalid details (e.g., missing required fields).
3. Submit the registration form.
Type (P / N / in): N
Test priority: High
Test type: Functional
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter valid doctor credentials (username and password).
3. Click the login button.
Type (P / N / in): P
Test priority: High
Test type: Functional
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter invalid doctor credentials (e.g., incorrect password).
3. Click the login button.
Type (P / N / in): N
Test priority: High
Test type: Functional
1. Navigate to the appointment booking page.
2. Search for available time slots.
3. Select a specific time slot.
4. Confirm the appointment.
Type (P / N / in): P
Test priority: High
Result: The appointment should be successfully booked, and a confirmation message should be displayed along with the waiting time.
